name: smallga
description:
A playable demo for this new game in development.

Graphics Card Support

The windows version of the game works in selected computers , whose GPUs support the Vulkan Rendering API. It may or not work in selected versions of integrated intel graphics cards

(Mine does not work).

I promise to fix this as soon as support for OpenGl rendering for the game renderer is supported.

However the linux builds of the game will work in most (tested) linux machines because of the presence of vulkan supported drivers.

Reviews 

I will appreciate constructive reviews for the game , and what you think would make the players enjoy this little platformer.
